sense.def:
Podjetje, ki je
multinational
, ima podružnice v številnih državah.

seg.quote: Many of the West's large multinational companies have operations in Africa.
Trade in bananas is dominated by three huge food multinationals.

sense.def:
Izraz
multinational
uporabljamo tudi za opis stvari, ki zadevajo več različnih držav.

seg.quote: ...the multinational forces deployed under the treaty.
